Text.Page:
The Scions of Lok have reinforced their position with juggernaut mercs. You're to ensure they wasted their money.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:7#23#juggernaut mercenaries} in the eastern Cardovek Remnants.

Report to Prefect Nale at the Sanctum Mysterium when your mission is complete.
Outstanding. You can keep doing this until it stops being funny.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
